content:
FileInputStream
refreshToken
=
new
FileInputStream
(
"path/to/refreshToken.json"
);
FirebaseOptions
options
=
FirebaseOptions
.
builder
()
.
setCredentials
(
GoogleCredentials
.
fromStream
(
refreshToken
))
.
setDatabaseUrl
(
"https://<DATABASE_NAME>.firebaseio.com/"
)
.
build
();
FirebaseApp
.
initializeApp
(
options
);
